name: Pest In Reace!
description:
Hello everyone, I am a young Russian student who is just mastering the unity. This is my first game jam and experience of such development.

I participate in this jam not alone, but with a friend - a designer. He was responsible for the entire graphics. I, in turn, are the main and only programmer in the team.

I also had to add music, but I just didn't have time :"(

GAMEPLAY:

You play as a ghost who determines the fate of recently deceased people.

Where will their souls go, heaven or hell?

But bad luck, the time of your life is limited by the fact that if you do not judge anyone, your life timer expires, and then life itself.

In order not to die ahead of time, you will have to send brand new ghosts through the portals, but it is important not to be mistaken.

HOW TO PLAY:

wasd - player movement

left mouse button - use ghost hook

PURPOSE:

survive 10 waves and score as many points as possible

Good Luck!
